Main content start



 





 














Immigration
Find information about visa types, requirements and restrictions for obtaining your visa, traveling in and out of the US, gaining employment, maintaining your status, and more. Check out the following topics to learn more:
Bechtel Connect 
• Visa types
• Travel
• Employment
• Maintaining status
View more in the Immigration section 








 














Programs & Events
Bechtel International Center offers a variety of programs and events for our international community, including students, their spouses, partners and families, faculty, and staff. Learn more about our programs and upcoming events:
• Events calendar
• Event Space Reservations
• Programs for International Spouses and Families
View more in the Programs & Events section







 





 














Office of Global Scholarships
Are you looking for scholarships to study or conduct research overseas? Visit Bechtel International Center's Office of Global Scholarships and explore available opportunities.
Visit the OGS website








 














Bechtel Connect
Easily submit and track immigration requests, extension applications, change requests, and more through Bechtel Connect, our modern, mobile-responsive immigration portal.
 Go to Bechtel Connect






 






 



















Stay On Top of News
View and subscribe to Bechtel’s list of newsletters and make sure you're staying on top of the latest news and announcements.
View all newsletters
